dmca.title: [ABUSE] Illegal activity on www.evtracker.info
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

 

Please visit our web site at  <http://www.theplanet.com/legal>
www.theplanet.com/legal.

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


  _____  

From: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
[mailto:abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com] On Behalf Of mike ro
Sent: Thursday, January 12, 2006 1:39 AM
To: abuse@theplanet.com
Subject: [ABUSE] Illegal activity on www.evtracker.info


this in regards to www.evtracker.info

They are in blatent disregard to copryright laws. i dont see how its still
online please let me know if this is a legal site and if what they are doing
is legal


Registrant ID:9E9CD735577C2EA2
Registrant Name:Vid Kosir

please get back to me and let me know what the deal is


sincerly,
       Mike
